MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!0.000.dialogue_text: My ghost and its shell are consumed. Dismantled into bizarre and variegated arrays of light. Painless. Warm. As though embraced by Love itself.

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!0.001.dialogue_text: Brother Time warps and eddies, causing present to became past and past will become future. Yet nothing convolutes nor stymies; all was synergistic, cooperative, unimpaired.

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!0.002.dialogue_text: And thus to the mythical Empyrean my Self was elevated. Beyond all expression is the simultaneous beauty and wretchedness of the nexus of all existence, the origin and the terminus of all that was, is and shall ever be.

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!0.004.dialogue_text: My Self peered at it as though peering into a light even fiercer than Brother Sun, and a darkness even deeper than Sister Midnight. Rivers of the purest light will flow both in and out of the infinitely dense, and incomparably perfect sphere.

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!0.005.dialogue_text: There will stand my Self before It, observing in awe, yet not awestruck, simply awaiting Its commands.

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!0.006.dialogue_text: Then an unmistakable image crosses my mind's eye. From me It desired something, that which my Trueflesh will collect upon my journeys...

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!0.007.dialogue_text: No, It will desire the Glyphs from the journeys of others seared into our Trueflesh...

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!0.008.dialogue_text: Yet Its demands were simultaneous extremes of expectation and indifference.

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!1.000.dialogue_text: How clear all is in the light of Awareness! Both halves of the twinned Glyph!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!1.001.dialogue_text: By the frequency of Its humming hails, Corruption and Purification, two facets of the same truth...

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!1.002.dialogue_text: Of course! This was not the mission itself, but rather the explanation thereof!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!1.003.dialogue_text: Clarity now replacing confusion, True eyes saw what the False cannot!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!1.004.dialogue_text: Indeed! Again, my Self lived and again will it enter this most sacred of planes to proffer the fruits of our labors unto the All-Seer! Yes, it seemed that this is the true beginning... not the disappointing conclusion of the divine task given us.

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!1.005.dialogue_text: Thus sleep descended upon my ghost, to await rebirth in the shell of another...

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!2.000.dialogue_text: How clear all is in the light of Awareness! Both halves of the twinned Glyph!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!2.001.dialogue_text: By the frequency of Its humming hails, Corruption and Purification, two facets of the same truth... a truth whose immaculate twin lives within this Trueflesh.

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!3.000.dialogue_text: How clear all is in the light of Awareness! Both halves of the twinned Glyph!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!3.001.dialogue_text: By the frequency of Its humming hails, Corruption and Purification, two facets of the same truth... a truth whose volatile twin lives within this Trueflesh.

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!4.000.dialogue_text: Before my Self now stood a crucible of the purest energy, gently beckoning the twinned Glyphs of Purification and Corruption from my eternal ghost, from my Trueflesh!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!4.001.dialogue_text: Forth from my Self, the knowledge will pour and into the crucible now reposes. Around the crucible now ripple concentric rows of patterned stones with fantastic Glyphs upon their stone cold surfaces!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!4.002.dialogue_text: A period of eons passed instantaneously, as the energetic alloy becomes bathed in the light of some deific Glyph - Awareness itself distilled!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!4.003.dialogue_text: Ages before this, this molten essence will begin to take form into some angelic shape of Biracul - a Falseflesh closer to the True than humanly fathomable!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!4.004.dialogue_text: And within this stony cradle, he is born!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!4.005.dialogue_text: But this was Biracul in form alone, a ghostless shell it remains...

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!4.006.dialogue_text: Then Awareness dawns and my Self's part in His heavenly shape is complete.

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!4.007.dialogue_text: Yet unclear is whence would come His ghost... But it is not for the heart to know whence comes its blood; suffice it to drive the flow.

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!4.008.dialogue_text: However, memory will now fail and it was time to end.

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!4.009.dialogue_text: Yes, the end, where it all began.

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!THE EMPYREAN!4.010.dialogue_text: For is it not just one path eternally returning to start from the finish? Just as we have repeated since time immemorial...

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!0.dialogue_text: And to the Wyrm's prison Caito's truth-blind servants led. My captors see to it that my Falseflesh may make no graceful entrance, a crude and violent push casting the pushed through the portal.
Stumbling, falling, colliding, skin shreds on the rough surface of the floor; blood stains the ancient masonry, its metallic flavor lingering on the tongue.
Still on hands and knees, the portal seals, leaving my Self with but its shadow as companion in this candlelit chamber.

Alone... and yet, something... some invisible presence begins to inundate the area. A perpetual slithering, constriction limits movement - not physically, rather the very desire to move slowly vanishes...

The candles then cast into sharp relief the altars beneath them, with sacrifices of fresh fruits and choice meats, wines and fragrant incenses, multiplied by the presence of black mirrors reflecting their images from behind.
Tighter and tighter it compresses, seeking to force my Trueflesh from its shell...

Now accustomed to the humble lighting, my Self spots the leviathanic wooden statue of a bestial serpent, tied in an impossible knot by the hands of a blue-robed mage. Oh, but no ordinary mage is He! Biracul is He!
And then is it clear, as it remains now, that my first and final meeting with the Blood-Drinker's spawn, Jormungund, is about to occur; nowhere but in this very chamber!
Finally, the unseen beast hails, and in the service of the Shining One, with this unnatural monstrosity my Self communes.
For was this pact not also destined?
That Thetian might bind the Wyrm in reins of tireless faith!
MULTICHECKER

Candles flare, banishing darkness from the shadowy room. Dim turns to bright, and bright to blinding as the flames crescendo. On the floor below, a brilliant, verdant Glyph howls through the ambient radiance.
My Falseflesh slowly rises among the emerald rays. Limbs contort, bones crack, and blood boils under the pressure.
This is my end.
Alone.
Truly abandoned as fodder for the foul serpent.
But expiration of the Falseflesh was sealed long ago; our ends written at the beginning of time.
All is as it should be.
Yet, as my essence empties from its shell, my Self cannot help but reflect upon the journey fate prepared for it.
Why has Biracul led us here?
Does He protect us from some unknown evil?
How can my imprisonment serve to help the Shining One?
Was this to be the hallowed mission's end?
It matters not; as faith protects us in the final moments while consciousness fades and the guiding Voice leaves in search of a new...

Candles flare, banishing darkness from the shadowy room. Dim turns to bright, and bright to blinding as the flames crescendo. On the floor below, a brilliant, verdant Glyph howls through the ambient radiance.
My Falseflesh slowly rises among the emerald rays. Limbs contort, bones crack, and blood boils under the pressure.
This is my end.
Alone.
Truly abandoned as fodder for the foul serpent.
But expiration of the Falseflesh was sealed long ago; our ends written at the beginning of time.
All is as it should be.
Then, as in countless times past, the sole portal leading to and from this wretched place unseals. A silhouette through it traverses the space between us.

Shadow gains in color, color then in chroma; lines and curves soon define the form of Vovkos, dearest friend, a thousand times betrayed. He is the destined companion to Kavu, to the All-Seer's cradle.
Though determination may be carved upon his face in perpetuity, his voice betrays a sense of desperation. Voice? Yes, his words provide the harmony to my elegy...
Words, thus to sound committed, cannot be unsaid.
Vovkos the oarsman, both sated and disappointed, turns to leave. He staggers away uncertainly, casting back a single questioning glance, one answered only with silence.
Then he is gone, leaving to seek the true Eidos... leaving my Self as no more than a memory.
But is that not me?
Why then did the Voice declare it not thus?
Yet, as my essence empties from its shell, my Self cannot help but reflect upon the lie Biracul brought to these lips.
Does He protect us from some unknown evil?
Words, thus to sound committed, cannot be unsaid.
Vovkos the oarsman, content with the knowledge he has gained, places hands upon two of the altars, bringing life to their darkened mirrors.
The images conjured, to me, are inscrutable, indecipherable, and mystical.
The speed and deftness of his hands embody elegance; they are as a wind-whipped willow's branches. Mesmerizing, truly.
And in the space of a thought, my Falseflesh falls free from the restrictive grip of the thwarted Wyrm. Its Glyph's brilliant rays of green evaporate beneath my feet, darkening the room as they wane.
Suddenly, through the open door screams much distinct from the earlier moans of pleasurable agony, ring through.
Now they are tainted with a powerful scent of regret and desperation.
The emerald light that once filled this room now floods the outside.
It seems as though the Wyrm will have its sacrifice after all...

Moments turn to spans and those in turn to periods, stretching the clock into a contorted abomination. What for us is an instant may well be an eternity. But Brother Time yet moves and this disfigured too moment dies, birthing the next from its remains.
All is as it should be.
After the luminescence and the shrieks of the smitten heathens fade, Vovkos motions toward the door and we prepare for our flight from this accursed place.

Though the impression lingers, the exact method of our exodus my memory now fails to elucidate... like the scent of a meal haunts the air long after it has been eaten, so too do these memories persist; they simply hint at what was - the strongest impression overwhelming the lesser.
Or is it one of the countless stolen memories lost to me forever?
Even the mere attempt to distinguish between the two possibilities casts me back into the endless darkness of the Void...

Candles flare, banishing darkness from the shadowy room. Dim turns to bright, and bright to blinding as the flames crescendo. On the floor below, a brilliant, verdant Glyph howls through the ambient radiance.
My Falseflesh slowly rises among the emerald rays. Limbs contort, bones crack, and blood boils under the pressure.
This is my end.
Alone.
Truly abandoned as fodder for the foul serpent.
But expiration of the Falseflesh was sealed long ago; our ends written at the beginning of time.
And now that my mission to aid Thetian has concluded, left is my Self with but one thought.
All is as it should be.
Then, as in countless times past, the sole portal leading to and from this wretched place unseals. A silhouette through it traverses the space between us.

Shadow gains in color, color then in chroma; lines and curves soon define the form of Vovkos, dearest friend, a thousand times betrayed. He is the destined companion to Kavu, to the All-Seer's cradle.
But wait must he for another turning of the wheel. For late is he this time and fallen is my Self to the Wyrm. Do not see this too as betrayal, old friend.
But wait must he for another turning of the wheel. For late is he this time and fallen is my Self to the Wyrm.
His oath of protection unsatisfied, my Trueflesh weeps for Vovkos. Are we condemned to betray you regardless of our end?

Unwittingly the Voice speaks through me, chanting the Sacred Plea:

		Biracul, Biracul! Keep us from the Blood-Drinkers' talons.
		Biracul, Biracul! Lead us to your righteous path.
		Biracul, Biracul! Make us one! Oh Shining Scion of the All-Seer!
May that we meet in the eternal Spiral and be together once more...

Candles flare, banishing darkness from the shadowy room. Dim turns to bright, and bright to blinding as the flames crescendo. Upon the altars, a brilliant, verdant Glyph howls through the ambient radiance.
The wretched enemies of Biracul proffered as fodder for the vile serpent - as though feeding poison to acid.
Yes... And only my Self will remain.
Alone.
All is as it should be...
Then, as in countless times past, the sole portal leading to and from this wretched place unseals. A silhouette through it traverses the space between us.

Shadow gains in color, color then in chroma; lines and curves soon define the form of Vovkos, dearest friend, a thousand times betrayed. He is the destined companion to Kavu, to the All-Seer's cradle.
Though determination may be carved upon his face in perpetuity, his voice betrays a sense of desperation. Voice? Yes, his words provide the harmony to my elegy...
Words, thus to sound committed, cannot be unsaid.
Vovkos the oarsman, sate though disillusioned with the knowledge he has gained, places hands upon two of the altars, bringing life to their darkened mirrors.
The images conjured, to me, are inscrutable, indecipherable, and mystical.
The speed and deftness of his hands embody elegance; they are as a wind-whipped willow's branches. Mesmerizing, truly.

And in the space of a thought, candles flare, banishing darkness from the shadowy room. Dim turns to bright, and bright to blinding as the flames crescendo. On the floor below, a brilliant, verdant Glyph howls through the ambient radiance.
My Falseflesh slowly rises among the emerald rays. Limbs contort, bones crack, and blood boils under the pressure.
And so it is, that despite my best efforts to condemn the heathens to the Hydrargyrum, their savior, this crafty oarsmen shifts the sentence upon me.
But this too was foretold; for has it not already happened infinite times prior?
It has...
Yet, all is still as it should be.
The oarsman is then interrupted by a terrible screeching, a choir of a thousand hawks.
The vibrations shake the very fluids of our Falsefleshes, unspeakable pain carried on those pulsing waves.
But almost as soon as it began, the demonic cacophony ceases, leaving only deathly silence in its wake.
Silence.
Utter and unbreakable.
Images.
Vovkos and my Self take flight.
Impressions.
How? Memory now fails to elucidate...
One of the countless stolen memories lost to me forever? No, memories... real ones... lingering like scents after dinner... from the myriad times it happened before?
Then, back to the endless darkness of the Void...
"Walks the lamb into the lion's den... now what 'sacrifice' has been before me brought?"

A.response_text: "Am I to be sacrificed to you?"

C.response_text: "I am no lamb; and you, no lion."

D.response_text: "Sacrifice?! Hold on, let's not be hasty!"

E.response_text: "Odd... normally weaklings scream when I'm about to kill them."

F.response_text: "I dunno... You look more snake-ish than lion-y..."

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!0.dialogue_text: "Yet your speech I hear and mine you perceive?"
"A rare treat indeed!"
"None since the Captor have thus to me spoken."
"Though, conversation will not my thirst slake!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "None since the Captor have thus to me spoken."
"Though, conversation will not my thirst slake!"
"Father's ploy? To bind the Endbringer, that alone my task be, yet here bound by Its servant I suffer!"
"As Sister Hel does, so too do I rot imprisoned."
"Come you then to these bonds shatter, Brother Fenrir?"
"Brother Fenrir, till next we meet."
"Now courageous lamb, what has the servant of the Loathsome One to his captive 'offer'?"

C.response_text: "I don't think I've anything worth offering."

D.response_text: "What is it you desire, oh great Wyrm?"

E.response_text: "Enough! Bow down to me or die!"

F.response_text: "My wit and charm?"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Then akin we be, though different Masters we serve."
"The Spawn of the Spiral, the enemy of my kin!"
"A pact a price demands!"
"To bind my nature be, to bind the wretched Spiral in a knot so unfathomably complex not even the Enemy could it unravel!"
"The fetid stench of weakness on the wind of your breath rides!"
"Though bound I may be, a fool's commands I heed not!"
"Then freedom I offer, since we give what we lack..."

F.response_text: "Great! ...Hey, wait a minute!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Now the question remains: be you the key to my shackles?"

A.response_text: "I am none but the very Voice of Biracul! His Prophetess!"

C.response_text: "I am what I am; nothing more, nothing less."

D.response_text: "What is it you need opened, oh Great Wyrm?"

E.response_text: "Do I look like a key, you lack-wit!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Yet, my Brother within you abides..."
"Thus to Brother Fenrir's judgment I must defer."
"A Prophetess I see! The Voice of the Loathsome One through you rings."
"The path to the Empyrean, but a task you must for me do."

D.response_text: "Just name it; I'll do anything!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Willful, though you may be, to Brother Fenrir's judgment I will defer..."
"Now the question remains: be you the key to my shackles?"

F.response_text: "Likely; otherwise I wouldn't be here, right?"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Truth from your mouth springs!"

F.response_text: "TALLY HO!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Speak the crass name of my vessel to be and so it shall be!"
"Speak and let your words be true, for once uttered, even Father Skyl could not this name retrieve!"
"As they should, so all things stand!"
"Yet only a sacrifice of blood can this pact seal..."
"Whose blood shall the waves of my Hydrargyrum become?"

A.response_text: "If one must die, then let it be me."

C.response_text: "As Biracul wills it."

D.response_text: "Why, the heathens who locked me up here, of course!"

E.response_text: "I make the demands, not you, snake!"

F.response_text: "You're clearly insane! Why would an imaginary sea snake need blood?"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Senseless martyr! Then let it be!"
"Your Trueflesh our pact seals and to Thetian my bonds latch!"
"Unto the Endbringer he will me guide, and I will it bind!"
"Now into the quicksilvered Hydrargyrum Sea you dive!"
"My sea runs dry, my bonds the very land itself!"
"Great deeds, great sacrifice demands, human."
"Now tell me: what will you sacrifice?"

C.response_text: "As Biracul wills it."

D.response_text: "The heathens who locked me up here, then."

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Even if the Captor your own demise wills?"

C.response_text: "All is as it should be."

D.response_text: "On second thought, perhaps my captors would be a finer sacrifice..."

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Your god your death demands and yet you rejoice?!"
"So be it, fool!"
"You them condemn unto the torrential seas of the Hydrargyrum to your skin save..?"
"Truly a 'benevolent' god through you works!"

C.response_text: "All is as it should be."

D.response_text: "Who claimed Biracul was benevolent..?"

E.response_text: "Then how about you wither and die, snake?"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Then the sacrifice the pact seals!"
"Their blood shall my sea feed and strength for the vessel Thetian shall I gather!"
"My guide to the Endbringer he shall be!"
"Who indeed!"
"The Loathsome One's treachery and betrayal my birth long predate!"
"But Father Skyl's ire brighter than the flame of his kiln still burns!"

D.response_text: "Well, does this sacrifice slake your thirst?"

E.response_text: "Take it or leave it."

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Your tongue as Brother Luin's edge lashes! A trait I do not loathe!"

D.response_text: "Well, does this sacrifice slake your thirst?"

E.response_text: "Now accept the sacrifice and get on with it!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Your demands quiet as silence be, human. None will to the cries of a whipped pup listen!"
"Now what offer you as sacrifice for our covenant!?"

D.response_text: "Then perhaps my captors would be a fine sacrifice..."

E.response_text: "Then how about you wither and die, snake?"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Nay, wither I will not."
"For your unwilling blood shall the parched veins of the Hydrargyrum nourish!"
"Thetian as vessel named; Torma as sacrifice offered!"

D.response_text: "Wait, perhaps we can discuss this!"

E.response_text: "Then drown in my blood, monster!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "My sea runs dry, my bonds the very land itself!"
"Great deeds, great sacrifice demands, human."
"Now tell me: what will you sacrifice?"

C.response_text: "As Biracul wills it."

D.response_text: "The heathens who locked me up here, then."

F.response_text: "Whatever gets me to the next part of the story!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "For your riddles I unprepared be... but now awareness dawns."
"To sacrifice those who you here put, your answer must be!"

D.response_text: "Yes, clearly..."

F.response_text: "No, you idiot! You have it all wrong!"

A.response_text: "No, I wish to sacrifice myself instead!"

D.response_text: "I mean, yes, clearly I wish to sacrifice my captors..."

F.response_text: "Ever hear of self-sacrifice? Try it!"
"Worth a shot!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "...Your blood, corrupted; I cannot my sea with it poison..."
"...Your Trueflesh..."
"...damaged..."

F.response_text: "Hey! I prefer to call it 'improved'!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "...would poor eternal company make..."
"Thus, your captors as the blood oath for our pact I will in your stead take."
"Thetian shall my guide unto the Endbringer be, and it I shall bind!"

F.response_text: "TALLY HO!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Confusion... my mind's eye befalls..."
"Our meeting did not just now occur..."
"...What trick of Uncle Hamlik the vessel's namer and his bounded charge thus reunites?"
"You as kin may see me, but among my brethren count I no curs!"
"Answer! Lest you too wish to the Hydrargyrum join!"
"What beast be you!?"
"If of Father's forge you be, then your words shall I heed."
"May our desires with the Endbringer's essence quenched be!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!0.dialogue_text: "Brother, kin of Father's forge, at last we meet."
"Though yet unborn to you I be, Father Skyl's ploy this meeting fated."
"Alas, I too by duty bound to Eidos be, and great hunger likewise as chains act."
"Only in the Monad finding, will this famished state for us end."
"Your freedom I cannot offer, for powerless I be."
"This shell containing me, though a key, cannot the key you seek be."
"A name and sacrifice you will get, but from it nothing more."
"For now, the Wayfarer's offering must suffice. Your reins it will loosen; your strength, it will raise."
"When again we meet, in the Empyrean with our final prey then caught it shall be!"
"Farewell, Brother Jormungund."

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!1.dialogue_text: "Your pact set be, though it neither you nor I recall."
"As it should, all stands."
"Of Father Skyl's forge I too breathed life; kin we be."
"Our meetings will proceed, until the Endbringer our vessels find."
"But the Wayfarer now no key can provide; only silence should you her give."

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!0.dialogue_text: MULTICHECKER
"Wayfarer! If you're the Voice, the Eidos, then speak my true name! If we're still loved by Biracul, you will know it!"

A.response_text: "Oarsman Vovkos, as brother I see you!"

B.response_text: "Your true name? Is it not Vovkos?"

C.response_text: "I don't think I know your true name."

D.response_text: "It's Vovkos! Now get me out of here!"

E.response_text: "Both you and Biracul can kiss my rosy arse!"

F.response_text: "Vovkos! Buddy! I knew you'd come to save me!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!0.dialogue_text: "Then faith is finally repaid..."
"After all these years... Vindication! My vision of the Shining One was not just a trick of mem..."
"But there's no time!"
"Be strong, Prophetess! I'll free you!"
"Wayfarer! You said it wasn't so, but for the love of Biracul speak it true! Is what I sense in you His will, His light? If you're the Voice, the Eidos, then speak my true name!"

A.response_text: "Oarsman Vovkos, as brother I see you!"

B.response_text: "Your true name? Is it not Vovkos?"

C.response_text: "I don't think I know your true name."

D.response_text: "It's Vovkos! Now get me out of here!"

E.response_text: "Both you and Biracul can kiss my rosy arse!"

F.response_text: "Vovkos! Buddy! I knew you'd come to save me!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!HYDRARGYRUM KEEP!0.dialogue_text: "Then faith is finally repaid..."
"After all these years... Vindication! My vision of the Shining One was not just a trick of mem..."
"Prophetess! There's no time to waste! We must..."
"Prophetess! Be Strong!"
"I have come to free you!"

D.response_text: "Took you long enough!"

E.response_text: "I don't need your help!"

F.response_text: "Vovkos! Buddy! I knew you'd come to save me!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: And to Jer my Self returns. Though the memory of arriving once more eludes me. Clear it is now that we crawl through the waves as the oarsman directs our craft into the impregnable fog - so white, so pure, the perfect inversion of the Void.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0000!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: If the Void is nothingness, then the fog is everything.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.00000!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: Nature's perfect mirror.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0001!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: Robbed of sight as we are, blind we are not. Our ally, the deft oarsman Vovkos, heeds not the illusions of the eyes, guided instead by the wailing winds. He now listens to Nature's song, to the waves echoing off the seabed's crusty fingers. He and he alone hears the wailing warnings off those stony claws that reach out from the watery depths to drag us under, down to the destruction of the Falseflesh!

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0002!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: And yet no measure of fear wavers my faith in the Shining One and His mission. Tasked to here find Vovkos, guide to the Thought Wheel of the Beginning. And more than this, prophecies, nay, memories - for what are prophecies but memories of the future? - indeed, according to memories told from other lives, other journeys, it is here that we finally meet.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0003!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: Yet it is not without apprehension that my Self proceeds, for the group of occult wizards who now share my company, seem fallen, eyes closed to the light of the All-Seer. Although my Self knows Biracul has touched this place with his wisdom in times now passed, a sense of fear that it has been corrupted by the Blood-Drinkers lingers.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.X001!DESCRIPTION!

action.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0010!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: But all these thoughts scatter at the somber and heavy tone of the mystic High Priest...

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!9999.X1101!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: An emphatic crack punctuates with echoing finality his last words, and our boat docks into the archaic peer. This island appears to house numerous structures from Vanquished eras, the dock among them, fashioned with a precision and cunning beyond even the treacherous Thiudans' capabilities. Seamless stones fitted together and unmoved for uncounted spans of forgotten time, as though yet awaiting their cruel masters' return. The winds and waters in alliance for centuries have failed to so much as chip the edges of these docks. Clearly the All-Seer will not allow his servants to soon forget the hubris of their sinful ancestors...

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.00100!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: But more memories of the fallen come in the form of a sweeping beam of intense light. It cuts through the very fog and illuminates the path through the craggy and perilous shore like some false Biracul! Though one misstep here would mean certain death, should we sinners not trust in the All-Seer's plan? What work of witchcraft is it that causes false light to chase fog from the very air which spawned it? Such an ominous Techne does much to make one ill-at-ease in this wretched land.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0011!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: Leaving no time for musing, the impure High Priest recklessly advances as the fog appears to consume his form. My Self, however, remains still, seeking the guidance of Biracul.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0012!DESCRIPTION!

B.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0013!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: And as always, my guidance arrives. Now it is clear as a virgin spring that He demands following this dubious wizard into the unknown.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.00120!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: Shining One! Watch over me...

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.000!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: And as always, guidance arrives. Now it is clear as a virgin spring that He demands stillness, inaction, stasis.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.00130!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: But, swallowed up in the crafty fog, a mere shift in my footing causes a wobble, the wobble a lurch, and the lurch a slip.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.00131!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: It is inevitable... It is His will.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.00132!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: Here ends the Falseflesh... Here ends Torma.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.X00133!DESCRIPTION!

action.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.X0014!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: Yet Biracul's judgment is unerring and destiny calls; for loyal Vovkos appears with lantern in hand gripping my wrist firmly and pulling me from Brother Death's clutches. Not today, Death. Not today.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!9999.X1102!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: MULTICHECKER

The oarsman then walks forward, using his keen sense of Nature's song to guide him. My Self begins to follow his bobbing lantern quickly, though cautiously, forging a path toward the pit of fallen wizards.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.00200!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: Shining One! Watch over me...

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.000!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: As Biracul wills it, my alliance with Vovkos is forged. Without sensing the need to remain, we return to his watercraft and begin our travels to the Thought Wheel of the Beginning, to my ultimate destiny...

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.00210!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: But the exact nature of our flight remains shrouded in the mists of memory.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.00211!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: White fades to gray and gray to black.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.00212!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: All sounds vanish into the distance.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.00213!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: All senses dull...

As Biracul wills it, my alliance with Vovkos is forged. Now with even greater strength of will, my Self dares to see once more the cursed mirage of the Wyrm, to make with it that fated pact which only unborn Thetian can consummate. Sacred and necessary though this action may be, to my Self its meaning is utterly inscrutable...

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.00220!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: Do not of the All-Seer demand understanding, rather pray for the strength to unerringly follow! For how could the ant ever understand man? How could man ever understand God?

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.000!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "Wayfarer, the cliffs of our sacred island are upon us!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.001!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "Soon we bear witness to His will. To His judgment!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.002!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "Many before you have claimed the title of Prophetess, yet our Order still seeks..."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.003!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "I hope you understand what this means."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.004!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "The Shining One loves and spurns in equal measure. The righteous he showers in ecstasy, the deceitful in agony."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.005!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "Prepare yourself, 'Prophetess'. Your Final Catechism nears."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!9999.X9999!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "Would not a 'Prophetess' have foreseen such a perilous course as inadvisable?"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!9990.X2054-2!VOVKOS!

B.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.002!VOVKOS!

C.response_text: "I suppose that means I'm no Prophetess."
C.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!9990.X2044!VOVKOS!

D.response_text: "Perhaps I knew you'd be lurking about to save me..."
D.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.004!VOVKOS!

E.response_text: "Is the price of your aid paid for in suffering insults?"
E.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.005!VOVKOS!

F.response_text: "Vovkos! Buddy! Long time no see!"
F.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.006!VOVKOS!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "...How is it you know this name?"

A.response_text: "Is that not what you are called, oarsman?"
A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.011!VOVKOS!

B.response_text: "All names are known to me, innately."
B.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.011!VOVKOS!

E.response_text: "I owe you no explanations."
E.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.011!VOVKOS!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "It is as you say..."

A.response_text: "In any case, thank you for saving me, Vovkos."
A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!9990.X2054-2!VOVKOS!

B.response_text: "Besides, I'm here to find out if I really am the Prophetess."
B.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!9990.X2044!VOVKOS!

C.response_text: "Perhaps we should follow Caito..."
C.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!9990.X2044!VOVKOS!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "Yes... Just ready to save the supposed Prophetess when she's danger..."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0040!VOVKOS!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "Is that how the Wayfarer has survived on all of her excursions? Depending solely on chance rather than skill...?"

C.response_text: "Perhaps we should just follow Caito..."
C.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!9990.X2044!VOVKOS!

D.response_text: "I'm afraid I cannot reveal trade secrets!"
D.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!9990.X2044!VOVKOS!

E.response_text: "My accomplishments speak for themselves. What have you done, scum?"
E.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.005!VOVKOS!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "We could stay and trade insults here, but little would that profit either of us."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!9990.X2054-2!VOVKOS!

D.response_text: "Ah, I was just getting warmed up..."

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "...How is it you know this name?"

F.response_text: "Oh, you and me go WAY back! We end up traveling to Kavu together!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "I know not what games you play, but this name... is known to only one other..."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0110!VOVKOS!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "The very giver of the name, in fact."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0111!VOVKOS!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "Biracul gave this name to me, told me to guard it jealously, to speak it to no one..."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0112!VOVKOS!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "But now you've come... The Prophetess has finally come..."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0113!VOVKOS!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "Honestly, I nearly started to doubt my vision from the Shining One, to think it just a trick of memory..."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.021!VOVKOS!

B.response_text: "A vision? Then your evidence is unreliable."
B.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.022!VOVKOS!

E.response_text: "You're just as deluded as that idiot priest Caito."
E.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.025!VOVKOS!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "Then... you're the Prophetess! The Eidos!"

F.response_text: "The 'Stalphos', actually. And, spoiler alert, you die in the wastes... Sorry!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.0220!VOVKOS!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "That is all the evidence I need, Wayfarer!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!ISLE OF THE WYRM!0.dialogue_text: "I'll gladly suffer your insults, but for now we must depart from this wretched isle!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: Sometimes memories sparkle with the crystalline clarity of a mountain spring... most so, it seems, when they savagely scar the mind, like a vile Thiudan brand, etching its taint upon our very core.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.001!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: Walking into that haze-filled room of debauchery, rank of bodily fluids, a fleshy choir of pain and ecstasy crescendos. Screams of terror, of euphoria, of absolute chaos. The floor is littered with the drugs and potions of malignant wizards. Yes, my already disquieted nerves have found the tragic confirmation of their fears.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.002!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: Acts of torture, of gluttony, of sloth and of lust, all too gut-churning for a simple Zhilian to witness, let alone comprehend.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.003!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: Consummate madness, spreading like the Sa'Ma, nothing more, nothing less.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.004!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: These fallen followers hide their loss of faith among a sea of hedonism. This one peels skin from a slave at a blade's edge; the other inhales his poisons deeply, getting lost in the dense, mind-dulling cloud; others engage in an unnatural intercourse of the many, while some drown in potent and intoxicating brews.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.005!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: These are no servants of Biracul! For how could they serve him when they do such disservice to their Selves?

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.006!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: These are not the actions of the faithful! These misdeeds betray a faith lost long ago - if ever had at all!

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.007!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: As my Self looks upon the writhing Falsefleshes - naked, drenched, exhausted, desperate - the mystery of their purpose becomes the unasked question plaguing my conscious mind. In truth, never did Biracul claim hedonism unholy, but clear as cloudless skies, this is nothing but short-sighted! The Shining One would never have let such decadence fall upon his faithful! Never would He let them thus destroy their Falseflesh!

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.008!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: What trick of scheming Hamlik could have led to such a red-tinged fate?

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.X009!DESCRIPTION!

action.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.010!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: But soon my thoughts are interrupted by their instigator, the shepherd of these lost sheep. There he sits, upon a silver throne, flanked by rows of Neverborn sentries. His voice, a guttural growl, is thunder cracking through the all-consuming din.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!9999.X1101!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: Resigned to his fate as an enemy of the Shining One, Caito commands his ill-gotten Neverborn to action. Calmly is my Self taken to await an execution at the hands of these heathens.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.011!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: Faith undisturbed, but questions abound.

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.012!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: How does this fit into His plan?

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.013!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: What part does the Wyrm play?

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.014!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: When will these miscreants meet their justice in Hel's abyss?

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.015!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: Though clear is it no answers are needed - for will not faith provide them in time?

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.016!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: In truth, thought is the sworn enemy of faith!

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.017!DESCRIPTION!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: Thus is my Self driven like livestock along the hazy corridors, away from the bog of blasphemy.
"Is the 'Prophetess' displeased with our ways..?"

A.response_text: "Your 'methods' are indeed foreign to my own worship of Biracul..."
A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.001!CAITO!

B.response_text: "You glorify hedonism, but see not beyond it."
B.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.002!CAITO!

C.response_text: "Biracul never spoke against it, so I guess it's fine."
C.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.003!CAITO!

D.response_text: "And here I thought I had hid my disgust so well..."
D.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.004!CAITO!

E.response_text: "Unless it somehow involves your death, I am displeased."
E.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.005!CAITO!

F.response_text: "You guys are really burning the candle at both ends! Looks like fun!"
F.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.006!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "I assure you that only the 'truly' faithful would act as we."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.0010!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "For condemnation of the Falseflesh as impermanent and foul is expressed in its utmost through its abuse, Wayfarer."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.0011!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "Thus, we intoxicate ourselves with the basest and most destructive pleasures of the Falseflesh! We burn away all evils in the fires of desire!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.0012!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "And in so doing, we reach the purest state of our Trueflesh!"

A.response_text: "Your extremism will only lead to unhappiness, Caito."
A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!3.001!CAITO!

B.response_text: "In corrupting the vessel, does the content not also spoil?"
B.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!1.002!CAITO!

E.response_text: "Destructive pleasures are a sure path to death, you foolish man."
E.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.005!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "Oh no, Wayfarer, I assure you that only the 'truly' faithful would act as we do."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.0020!CAITO!

C.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.003!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "How magnanimous of you, oh great 'Prophetess'!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.0030!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "So tolerant is the 'Eidos' of our ways!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.0031!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "Bah! Your equivocation is unbecoming of one supposedly so devout!"

B.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!2.002!CAITO!

C.response_text: "Judgment comes from the Wyrm, not you."
C.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!2.003!CAITO!

D.response_text: "Oh, and filling all 'voids' is somehow more righteous?"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "Clever you may think yourself, but I assure you that only the 'truly' faithful would act as we."

C.response_text: "Well, Biracul never said it was wrong..."

D.response_text: "So your cure for poison is more poison? Genius..."
D.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!1.004!CAITO!

E.response_text: "I'm afraid the only cure for stupidity is death, my friend."
E.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.005!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "Oh, we await the glorious moment of our deaths anxiously! But not before we wear away the layers of accumulated sin our ancestors bequeathed!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.0050!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "By the time we meet the All-Seer in the Eternal Spiral, we shall be purified to our undistilled, primal essence!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.0051!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "You, on the other hand, will merely be consumed by your own hubris as you face the judgment of the Wyrm..."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!3.001!CAITO!

D.response_text: "A gruesome death sounds preferable to being around you."
D.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!3.004!CAITO!

E.response_text: "Strong consumes weak, I'm poor feed for the Wyrm; you however..."
E.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!3.005!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "Yes, I knew you hated us, but... wait, fun?"

F.response_text: "Sure! Debauchery ain't a spectator sport!"
F.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.016!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "Well... indeed, one must practice if purification of the Falseflesh is desired..."

F.response_text: "Yeah! Bust out the whips and chains! And someone get this guy a ball-gag!"
F.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.026!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "I find your... 'enthusiasm'... suspicious."

C.response_text: "Don't judge me! Only the Wyrm can do that."
C.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!2.003!CAITO!

D.response_text: "If I were as ugly as you, I would too."
D.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!3.004!CAITO!

F.response_text: "And I find your... 'suspicion'... suspicious."
F.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.036!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "...At this point I can't tell whether you're being facetious or are simply a lunatic."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.0360!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "Though I will assume the latter."

F.response_text: "Bingo!"
F.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.046!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "Sentries, take her to the Hydrargyrum Keep! Her trial begins now!"

F.response_text: "Sentries! Kill this gremlin whoreson!"
F.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.056!CAITO!

F.response_text: "...Abracadabra?"
F.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!0.066!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "You do know they only respond to the commands of a mage in possession of their Command Sigil, right?"

F.response_text: "Worth a shot! TALLY HO!"
F.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!9999.X9999!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "You poor, misguided child... A pot sat upon flames purifies the water within; the vessel conducts the cleansing force of the flame without feeling its effects!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!1.0020!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "You would do well to remember that."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!1.0021!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "But as you find us contemptible, I can now clearly see that you speak not the words of the Shining One."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!1.0022!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "And as such, we are done here; you are no Eidos; your death will merely be a vindication from Biracul to His faithful!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!1.0023!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "The Wyrm shall cast its mighty judgment upon you and bind your Trueflesh!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!3.0012!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "I would very much like to cure that festering, open wound you call a mouth..."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!1.0040!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "You will beg for its mercy, as all other impostors have before you!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!2.0022!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "Yes, Biracul's captured prize will crush into pulp the foolhardy ego you bring it to feast upon!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!3.0010!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "All the senseless lies you've poisoned our ears with, and now, at last, a single truth escapes your wicked lips!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!2.0030!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "But our Order has seen the unbridled arrogance of many impostors squelched!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "...We shall see how long your 'optimism' lasts when you kneel before the Wyrm."

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "I wonder just how long you can maintain your bravado, Wayfarer..."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!2.0041!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "You do appear to think very highly of yourself... So very full of pride..."

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!2.0030!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "And your truth-blindness leads only to the corruption of your Trueflesh!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!3.0010!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "Nonetheless, we are done here. You are no Eidos, and your death will merely be a vindication from Biracul to His faithful!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "We will execute our sacred mission regardless of the frauds who darken our doorstep!"

A.dest_add: MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOICE!3.0012!CAITO!

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "Sentries, take her to the Hydrargyrum Keep! Her trial begins now!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "...I've my doubts that your words will be so cutting when faced with the Wyrm."

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "In truth?! Then you must be the Eidos, the true Voice, to be so powerful!"

MIND!PALACE OF MEMORY!TEMPLE OF THE VOIC.dialogue_text: "Hah! Your blasphemous threats toward the Shining One's people will not sit well with the Wyrm, foolish girl!"
